properties.title: Installing Hippo Channel Manager Page Management Support

section.name: Installing Hippo Channel Manager Page Management Support

subsection.name: Add Dependencies
subsection.p: Make sure you have the forge Maven2 repository reference and dependency definition in the root pom.xml of your project.

div.source:
<repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<repository> <id>channel-pagesup-maven-repo</id> <name>Hippo Channel Manager Page Management Support Maven 2 Repository</name> <url>http://forge.onehippo.org/svn/channel-pagesup/maven2/</url> </repository>
<!-- SNIP -->
</repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencyManagement>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- NOTE: You should set a property named 'forge.channel-pagesup.version' to a version of this plugin! -->
<!-- DocumentManagementService as CMS application side dependency --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.channel-pagesup</groupId> <artifactId>channel-pagesup-document-management-service</artifactId> <version>${forge.channel-pagesup.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- CopyPageEvent handler as SITE application side dependency --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.channel-pagesup</groupId> <artifactId>channel-pagesup-channel-page-event</artifactId> <version>${forge.channel-pagesup.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencyManagement>

subsection.p: And add the following dependency reference into your Hippo CMS Web Application module subproject.

div.source:
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- DocumentManagementService as CMS application side dependency --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.channel-pagesup</groupId> <artifactId>channel-pagesup-document-management-service</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>

subsection.p: And add the following dependency reference into your Hippo SITE Web Application module subproject.

div.source:
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- CopyPageEvent handler as SITE application side dependency --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.channel-pagesup</groupId> <artifactId>channel-pagesup-channel-page-event</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>

subsection.p: Now, you're ready to use the plugin!
